title: Places of Interest - City of Tuebingen
content:
Places of Interest
Discover the treasures of the historic old town: the Protestant seminary, in which Hölderlin, Schelling and Hegel once shared a study. Or the town hall in the marketplace, that is more than 500 years old. The Hölderlin Tower on the Neckar invites you to linger with a line of “Stocherkähne“, punting boats unique to Tübingen, at the tower´s feet, ready for a ride on the Neckar.
